_description: Gospel for the First Sunday after Easter in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint Iohn goddes derling dereTels till vs on þis manere…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And euer fend vs fro þe fendeAnd wiss vnto welth at wende
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Cum esset sero die illo & cetera.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica in octava pasche secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 89va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.187-193.
